p: Compared to the first generation of EWARS, the updated version demonstrated in all three countries an increased sensitivity and PPVs (Tables 2– 4). The sensitivity of correctly predicting an outbreak ranged between 83–99% in Brazil, 50–99% in Malaysia and 79–100% in Mexico. PPVs ranged between 40–88% in Brazil, 71–80% in Malaysia and 50–83% in Mexico. The analysis of serotype (using two-week lag-time) and ovitrap variables (using three-week lag-time) showed promising findings with sensitivity and PPVs of 50% and 71% for serotype and 79% and 60% for ovitrap, respectively.
